horaires.response: Our store is open Monday to Saturday from 9am to 8pm.

livraison.response: Free delivery in Casablanca. Nationwide delivery within 24-48h.

retours.response: Free returns within 14 days. Exchange or refund available.

paiements.response: We accept credit cards, bank transfer, and cash on delivery.

promotions.response: Get 15% off your first order with code WELCOME15!

faq.tracking: You will receive an SMS with a tracking link once shipped.
faq.stock: Check real-time availability on our website.
